numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that both basketball associations have the highest diversity in players.
2. The percentage of diversity in players in both basketball associations is higher than 80 percent.
3. I notice that Major League Soccer has the highest diversity in head coaches.
4. The percentage of diversity in head coaches in Major League Soccer is 41 percent.
5. I notice that the National Football League has the lowest diversity in head coaches.
6. I wonder why Major League Soccer has the highest diversity in head coaches.
7. I wonder why the Women's National Basketball Association has no data for 2020.
8. I wonder why the data was self-reported.
9. I wonder why no actual research was done.
12. My family and I see a lack of diversity in many sports leaders.
13. The results do not surprise my family and me.
14. The headline is: Diversity weaving its way to sports.
